title: San Francisco/Golden Gate
name: Letterman Complex
directions: between Lombard St and Presidio Blvd
content: Established in 1898 to care for sick and wounded soldiers, it is the Army's oldest named general hospital and during WWII it became the largest Army hospital in the country.  Today the complex is home to Lucas Films and lots of Star Wars fans make the pilgrimage there each year.  You won't get inside unless you know someone, but you can practice your "Jedi" skills outside with Yoda, at the "Yoda Fountain."
